name: Arcade Volleyball (SMS)
description:
Arcade Volleyball is a simple volleyball game I remember playing years ago on a DOS PC. But this game was originally conceived for the Commodore 64, and was also available for Amiga. The latter was distributed on a floppy disk included with the Fall 1989 edition of the Compute!'s Amiga Resource magazine, as an executable accompanied with its source code.

This project is a port of the Amiga version to the Sega Master System using devkitSMS. Playable using standard controllers and Sega HPD-200 Paddles, this game can be enjoyed by 1 or 2 players.
